>
[Eagle Eye](/Feats.aspx?ID=3220) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Gunslinger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=114)

**Prerequisites**
[Gunslinger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3215); expert in Perception

</column>

---

Your practice with crossbows and firearms has sharpened your attention to detail. You become a master in Perception.
name: Eagle Eye
